translation.en: [man] Last year, Americans purchased upwards of $3 billion in greeting cards.
translation.zh: 去年美国人购买了 超过三十亿美元的贺卡
婚礼卡 浪漫卡 感谢卡和生日卡

translation.en: with major holidays providing steady profits.
translation.zh: 各大节假日也为行业带来稳定收益

translation.en: It's a thriving industry where it's often said
translation.zh: （未来会更好） 这个行业欣欣向荣 常言道

translation.en: the right card can make the day.
translation.zh: 恰当的卡片能让人心花怒放
没错 我是一名作家
（奥刻印刷和装运公司） 卡片

translation.en: if you've got to label me.
translation.zh: 如果你们一定要给我贴标签的话

translation.en: I could see her pupils dilate.
"Well, if you're so famous, what have you written?"
translation.zh: “如果你这么出名 你都写了些什么？”

translation.en: I just shrugged, then I said...
"Only the top Valentine's Day card for the last three years in a row."
translation.zh: “过去三年来的 顶级情人节贺卡而已”
（年度卡片作者） 今年是哪一年来着？
然后 我亲爱的疯狂男士们

translation.en: At what point did the poor woman find out you're a hack?
translation.zh: 那个可怜的女人什么时候 发现你是骗子的？

translation.en: Sadly, it was but a single night of sweated bliss.
translation.zh: 可惜 只是一晚的甜蜜而已

translation.en: So she had some taste, then.
God, no. She was a fan of your work.
translation.zh: 天哪 不是 她只是喜欢的你作品罢了

translation.en: By the way, 90% of all cards are purchased by women.
translation.zh: 顺便一说 九成的卡片都是女人买的

translation.en: You better get with the program. You're no Taft.
translation.zh: 你最好跟上潮流 你不是塔夫特

translation.en: Taft, he was... he was great, right?
translation.zh: 塔夫特 他…他很棒 对吧？

translation.en: He quit cards to write novels.
translation.zh: 他退出贺卡业 改行写小说了
别被忽悠了 实习生

translation.en: Novels are for people who can't edit themselves.
translation.zh: 小说适合自身没有编辑能力的人

translation.en: Cards are still the ultimate challenge.

translation.zh: 对你来说 也许是的

translation.en: Sweet talk will get you nowhere.
Mr. Wentworth, Mr. Styvesan wants to see you.
translation.zh: 温特沃斯先生 斯泰韦森先生想见你

translation.en: I was just about to ask for a meeting.
Well, who's to say it's not good news?
Styvesan, I'm so glad you made the time.
translation.zh: 斯泰韦森 很高兴你抽出空来
这里有些很出色的作品

translation.en: I've been missing you. Why did you leave me?"
translation.zh: 我一直在想你 你为何离开了我？”

translation.en: -That's kind of bleak. -Ray, why don't you just--
"Honey, come back. It was my fault."
translation.zh: -你不妨… -“亲爱的 回来吧 是我的错”

translation.en: I'm thinking a whole line of "I Regrets."
translation.zh: 我想写一整行的“我后悔”

translation.en: -Could there be a song chip in there? -No.
Playing a sad song or something?
No song chips, no glitter-- just the truth, all right?
translation.zh: 没有歌曲芯片 没有闪光粉… 只有真相 好吗？

translation.en: 'Cause that's what cards have been missing.
translation.zh: 因为那是卡片所缺乏的

translation.en: Besides, I've heard complaints about the glitter.
translation.zh: 此外 我还收到关于闪光粉的投诉

translation.en: You know, I campaigned for a stronger glue about two years ago.
translation.zh: 大约两年前 我就要求换更强力的胶水

translation.en: -Ray, why don't you have a seat. -Let's go retro.
Could be hip. I'm thinking... dime trees.
translation.zh: 可能会非常时尚 我在想… 一角硬币树

translation.en: Girl opens the card, there's ten dimes for her.
translation.zh: 女孩打开卡片 看到十个一角硬币

translation.en: Could be great for someone you love who you owe money to.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢某人却欠她钱 这种卡片会很不错
好了 好吧 提高档次
25分硬币 那是你的主意 很好

translation.en: You want to put quarters in a romance card.
translation.zh: 你想在浪漫卡里放25分的硬币

translation.en: I'm gonna have to let you go.

translation.zh: 把我调到另一个部门吧
我可以折东西 你说什么？

translation.en: We have machines behind you that fold cards, Ray.
translation.zh: 雷 你后面的机器可以折卡片
快过一分钟三百张卡片？
好了 雷 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm gonna have to take your guild card.
Ray, why don't you, um, get your stuff some other time, okay?
translation.zh: 雷 不如改天来拿你的东西吧 好吗？

translation.en: We'll keep it safe for you.
What are you looking at? Get back to work.
And somebody water this damn thing. My daughter gave it to me.
translation.zh: 给这该死的东西浇点水吧 我女儿给我的

translation.en: Too many things dying around here.
My publisher says it has to be 120 pages, minimum.
translation.zh: 我的出版商说至少要120页

translation.en: Actually, I'm thinking of getting back into the card game.
You know, you're honest, and, uh...
translation.zh: 你知道 你很诚实 还有 嗯…
你还是处于离异状态 对吧？

translation.en: 'Cause the chase is the key. The chase.
translation.zh: 因为关键在于追求 追求

translation.en: I got a wife, I'm settled in,
translation.zh: 我有老婆 我已经安定下来了

translation.en: but I don't have that-- that drive,
You, the love of your life left you.
translation.zh: 而你 你的一生挚爱离开了你

translation.en: I never thought of it like that.

translation.zh: 千万不要为普罗大众泛泛写作

translation.en: [male vocalist] ♪ Well, I searched for my name ♪ ♪ Listing said "unknown" ♪
[man, on television] And on my left,

translation.zh: 是贫民区的骄傲与欢乐

translation.en: I've got twenty bucks in my pocket,

translation.zh: 送给坚持到最后的流浪汉

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Ray, I know you're in there!
translation.zh: 雷先生 我知道你在里面！

translation.en: [newscaster] And the giraffe baby will be at the city zoo for just two more weeks,
translation.zh: 长颈鹿宝宝会在市动物园多待两周

translation.en: so you'd better get down there.
The governor's office is about to make an announcement,
translation.zh: 州长办公室准备发表声明

translation.en: one he says will give the greeting card industry a boost.
translation.zh: 他说要大力宣扬贺卡业

translation.en: Have you noticed the flowers I planted?"
translation.zh: 你注意到我种的花了吗？”
听着 我切伤了一条肌腱

translation.en: They don't heal so fast. I can't ply my trade.
translation.zh: 不会这么快愈合 我没法干活

translation.en: And you can't write with the other fingers?
translation.zh: 你就不能用别的手指写作吗？

translation.en: You're gonna have to figure out a way to pay me.
You want me to blow you?
Hey, watch what you're saying. There's children present.
translation.zh: 喂 说话注意点 有孩子在场

translation.en: I have to watch him for my damn sister while she goes to school
translation.zh: 我妹妹去学校 学习如何清理牙齿的时候

translation.en: to learn how to clean teeth,
and it's against the law for me to take him to the track.
translation.zh: 带他去赛马场是违法的

translation.en: And I can't push him off the roof.
translation.zh: 我也不能把他推下屋顶
嗯 这样如何？ 什么？

translation.en: I thought he'd be afraid of you.
Come here, 'jito. I want you to meet Uncle Ray.
translation.zh: 过来 吉托 见见雷叔叔吧

translation.en: Consider yourself lucky. Trucks never leave you.
translation.zh: 算你走运 卡车永远不会离开你

translation.en: But they break down all the time. That's what my uncle says.
translation.zh: 但它们经常出故障 我舅舅这样说的

translation.en: Except he says they break down all the damn time.
translation.zh: 除了他说它们总他妈出故障
你们好 娘炮们 有什么新鲜事吗？

translation.en: [Cathy] Told him you'd be here tonight.
translation.zh: 告诉他你今晚会来这里
嘿 斯泰韦森 混得如何？

translation.en: The same. Look, I got a business proposition for you.
translation.zh: 老样子 听着 我有桩买卖给你做

translation.en: What have you been working on?

translation.zh: 主要是信函 你知道的

translation.en: some thank-yous, "I'm sorries." I'm-- I'm branching out.
translation.zh: 感谢函 道歉函之类的 我在拓展新领域

translation.en: That's great. Listen, I got a little side project going.
translation.zh: 真棒 听着 我接了一个兼职小项目
非正式的 走浪漫路线

translation.en: I need you to write a card.
A romance card, a great one.
translation.zh: 浪漫卡 要动人心弦

translation.en: Like the ones you used to write.
And instead of using words like "my love" or "my wife,"
translation.zh: 别用“我的爱”或“我的老婆”这种词

translation.en: I need you to use the word...
Listen, I... I can't promise anything, you know.
translation.zh: 听着 我… 我不能保证什么 你知道的

translation.en: There's good money here for you.
I'll pay you triple freelance rate.
translation.zh: 我会给你三倍的自由职业者价格

translation.en: I know I said a lot of nasty things about you.
translation.zh: 我知道我说了你很多坏话

translation.en: I just want you to know I was just being really, really honest and...
translation.zh: 我只想让你知道 我真的特别诚实…

translation.en: Hey, I might need to get into the office,
translation.zh: 嘿 我可能需要去办公室

translation.en: get some of my old notes and such, okay?
translation.zh: 拿一些我的旧笔记之类的东西 好吗？

translation.en: Make sure you use the back door, the one with the broken lock.
translation.zh: 务必走后门 锁坏了的那扇门

translation.en: So put the fuckin' money away.
You know, if you had it, then you can get it back.
translation.zh: 如果你有这个实力 就会重振旗鼓

translation.en: Do you remember the first card you ever wrote?
translation.zh: 记得你写的第一张卡吗？

translation.en: Was it for your mom, or...?
It had a heart on it, and, uh...
translation.zh: 我放了一颗心 还有…

translation.en: What did it say inside, do you remember?
translation.zh: 里面写了什么 你记得吗？

translation.en: Come back soon. Your son, Raymond."
translation.zh: 马上回来吧 你的儿子 雷蒙德”

translation.en: Come back? Where'd she go, on a trip, or...?
translation.zh: 回来？她去哪了 是旅行还是…

translation.en: She only had a few weeks left to live.
Like I was supposed to understand that.
I just thought she'd be coming back.
I think they buried her with it.
translation.zh: 他们大概把卡片和她一起下葬了

translation.en: [Madsen] Okay, y'all ready to get your poems on?
translation.zh: 好了 你们都准备好 分享诗歌了吗？
红灯 停下 红灯

translation.en: Please stick around. There's more to come.
translation.zh: 请别走开 接下来还有更多

translation.en: So, Ray, uh, what'd you think?
Well, your motorcycle tipped over on you.
translation.zh: 你的摩托车翻车了 压在你身上

translation.en: There was more to it than just that,
but, yeah, that was at the core of it.
translation.zh: 不过 对 那就是精髓

translation.en: Yeah. Well, she loved it more than I did, but...
translation.zh: 她比我更喜欢 不过…

translation.en: Yeah, he writes, too. Or wrote, I guess.
translation.zh: 他也是作家 或者曾经是吧

translation.en: Big Ray here used to be the best--
translation.zh: 大雷哥以前是最厉害的…

translation.en: the Bill Shakespeare of romance cards.
translation.zh: 浪漫卡领域的莎士比亚

translation.en: His wife left him for... Harold Lamb.
translation.zh: 他老婆离开他…跟哈罗德莱姆走了

translation.en: Oh, I know who Harold Lamb is.
Oh, yeah. So you know the guy that draws Optimistic Owl.
translation.zh: 那你认识画《乐观的老鹰》那人

translation.en: Ladies, um, do you guys want to get a booth,
translation.zh: 女士们 你们想要个隔间吗？

translation.en: maybe, um, talk about some poetry?
Bro, lose the bitter act. It ain't gonna get you laid.
translation.zh: 哥们 少点尖酸刻薄 这样泡不到妞

translation.en: Please. Tell me how to get laid.
translation.zh: 拜托 告诉我如何泡妞吧

translation.en: In other news today, Governor Speakman made a big announcement.
translation.zh: 现在播报其它新闻 州长斯皮克曼发表重大声明

translation.en: Listen up, everybody. The governor's on.
translation.zh: 注意听 州长在说话

translation.en: Today I am pleased to announce
translation.zh: 今天 我很高兴地宣布

translation.en: the state of California will establish a new holiday:
translation.zh: 加州会设立一个新节日

translation.en: an occasion for men, and women as well,
to tell their favorite lady friend just how much she means to them.
translation.zh: 可以告诉他们最喜欢的女性朋友 她对自己有多重要

translation.en: This was my niece Coco's idea.
translation.zh: 这是我侄女可可的主意

translation.en: We're going to hold a contest
to see who can write the most romantic card
translation.zh: 看谁能写出最浪漫的卡片

translation.en: "In an effort to inject new blood into the failing greeting card industry,
translation.zh: 为了给日落西山的贺卡业 注入新血液

translation.en: the governor is limiting contestants to amateurs and...
translation.zh: 州长规定 参赛选手仅限于业余人士和…
那就是你了 我的朋友
这一段圈起来以供参考

translation.en: Look, maybe it was providence you got fired.
You know, what I loved about your class is that you always made us write.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的课 是因为你总让我们写作

translation.en: You know, actually write in class.
translation.zh: 你知道 真的在课堂里写

translation.en: Yeah, that was so I could write.
I know. It was something to see.
I want to see you do it again.
Truth is, I haven't written anything good in three years. I...
translation.zh: 事实是 这三年来 我没写出过什么好东西

translation.en: Gosh, that is-- that's a bummer.
translation.zh: 天哪 那真是…真是个晴天霹雳

translation.en: Wonder what could have happened three years ago that would have
translation.zh: 不知道三年前发生了什么事

translation.en: I wonder if it was maybe when your wife left you for another guy.
translation.zh: 我在想是不是因为你老婆 为了另一个男人离你而去

translation.en: It's like talking to one of my seventh-graders.
translation.zh: 就像是跟我的七年级学生在讲话

translation.en: Look, I only see her when it's legally mandated.
translation.zh: 听着 我只在 法律强制的情况下才见她

translation.en: You're not still picking up the cat, are you?
Oh, shit. What day is it?
translation.zh: 该死 今天什么日子？

translation.en: You hate cats. You're not an animal person.
translation.zh: 你讨厌猫 你不是喜欢动物的人
-其中包括人类 -房租 走吧

translation.en: Well, I guess I should invite you in.
translation.zh: 我猜我应该邀请你进来

translation.en: That's okay. I like it warm.
translation.zh: 没事 我喜欢喝温的
生意怎么样 哈罗德？

translation.en: I don't know if you've heard, but they're doing a spin-off of one of my--
translation.zh: 我不知道你是否听说了 但他们在做一部衍生作品…

translation.en: Say, I've been meaning to ask you, uh, do you get a cut
translation.zh: 我一直想问你 你的作品在这座城里屡屡被剽窃

translation.en: off those wonderful rip-offs I see of your work all over town?
Sure, you must have seen 'em. Uh, the owl's getting the B.J.
translation.zh: 当然 你肯定看到了 老鹰做口交

translation.en: Or he's biting the head off your chicken character.
translation.zh: 或咬掉你小鸡角色的脑袋

translation.en: Yeah. You must have sued those guys, right?
translation.zh: 嗯 你肯定告了那些人吧？

translation.en: Oh, there's one where two owls are pissing in each other's mouths.
translation.zh: 有一幅作品中 两只鹰在彼此嘴里撒尿

translation.en: I must have seen that on 12 trucks today.
translation.zh: 我今天肯定在12辆卡车上看到了

translation.en: Oh. If it isn't the only two men I've ever slept with.
translation.zh: 是我睡过的两个男人啊

translation.en: I see you still haven't lost your talent for pissing people off.
translation.zh: 瞧 你依然保有把人气死的天赋

translation.en: Tell me, when you make love, does he make you wear an owl costume?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你们做爱时 他会让你穿老鹰服装吗？

translation.en: Or does he wear the costume?
translation.zh: 还是他自己穿老鹰服装？

translation.en: No one's in an owl costume.
Here's Tony. Give him his medicine and have him back on Saturday.
translation.zh: 这是托尼 给它喂药 周六把它送回来

translation.en: I don't know why the judge just didn't make you keep him.
translation.zh: 我不知道法官为何没让你照看它

translation.en: Because you insisted that we share custody.
translation.zh: 因为你执意坚持我们共享监护权

translation.en: Why did you leave me for this cardboard cutout?
translation.zh: 你为何因为这个无趣之人离开我？

translation.en: For a romance card writer, you weren't very romantic.
translation.zh: 作为一名浪漫卡作家 你并不浪漫

translation.en: I never brought my work home with me.
translation.zh: 我从没把工作带回家里

translation.en: I need the kid. Pays the rent.
translation.zh: 我需要那个孩子 付房租

translation.en: Can I have a vodka soda, please?
translation.zh: 给我来一杯伏特加苏打水

translation.en: I saw it on the back of a truck once.
translation.zh: 有次在卡车背面看到过
你不是布谷鸟 对吧？

translation.en: You're not Ray Wentworth, are you? The card guy?
translation.zh: 你不是雷温特沃斯吧？写卡片的人？

translation.en: That's all. I just love saying 'Dear wife.'
translation.zh: 就这些 我只是喜欢说‘亲爱的老婆’

translation.en: I'm a weirdo for cards. That's why I come here.
translation.zh: 我是卡片怪人 所以我来这里

translation.en: How many cats do you have?
[Madsen] Okay, y'all ready to get your poems on?
translation.zh: 好 准备好念诗了吗？

translation.en: This first one is about my jet ski.
translation.zh: 第一首是关于我的摩托艇

translation.en: [Karen] For a romance card writer, you weren't very romantic.
translation.zh: 作为一名浪漫卡作家 你并不浪漫

translation.en: [Buddy] You gotta forget about Karen. You gotta let her go.
translation.zh: 你得忘了凯伦 你得对她释怀

translation.en: [Madsen] Big Ray here used to be the best,
translation.zh: 大雷哥曾经是最厉害的

translation.en: the Bill Shakespeare of romance cards.
translation.zh: 浪漫卡领域的莎士比亚

translation.en: [Buddy] You're not still picking up the cat, are you?
"I'm with you in hard times especially.
translation.zh: “我与你同在 尤其在艰难时刻

translation.en: Look for me in your heart.
That is so sad, don't you think?
translation.zh: 太伤感了 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: That's a person who's asking for so little.
translation.zh: 那是一个不计回报的人

translation.en: You still got that awesome tattoo?
translation.zh: 那个很棒的纹身还在吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Seeing how awful these are is a real pick-me-up.
translation.zh: 嗯 看到这些东西多糟糕 真是让我精神一振

translation.en: You don't walk around all the time in a red smock with a name tag?
translation.zh: 你不用穿着红色工作服 戴着胸卡 一直走来走去吗？

translation.en: They bum me out with their upbeat attitude.
translation.zh: 他们乐观的态度让我郁闷

translation.en: All they ever do is make me feel more alone.
translation.zh: 他们的所作所为让我觉得更孤单

translation.en: So, why did you quit writing?
I just quit being good at it.
translation.zh: 我只是放弃当一名好作家

translation.en: Yeah, well, you'll get it back.
translation.zh: 嗯 好吧 你会重振旗鼓的

translation.en: You gotta have the feelings first, and then you can write about them.
translation.zh: 你首先得有感觉 然后就可以写了

translation.en: Hey, um, do you think that--
I like to get that shit over with.
Who did this to you? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 谁对你下手？你在这里做什么？

translation.en: What, are you working for Paper Hearts?
I think very highly of you, too.
You've heard the expression 'penny for your thoughts.'
translation.zh: 你听过那个表达 ‘给你一美分 分享你的心事’

translation.en: Well, here are ten dimes for your thoughts.
translation.zh: 这里有十个一角硬币 来交换你的心事

translation.en: Signed, the numb-nuts that's dating you."
translation.zh: 签名 和你约会的那个傻瓜”

translation.en: I'm Detective fucking Miller, fucking Homicide, that's who I am.
translation.zh: 我是他妈的凶杀组的 他妈的米勒警探

translation.en: What kind of cards you write, Wentworth?
translation.zh: 温特沃斯 你写什么样的卡？

translation.en: So every time I forget to give
one of your mushy-ass cards to my girl,
translation.zh: 送给我的女友 你写的多愁善感的卡片

translation.en: I get cut off for a month.
Perhaps if you were well-endowed, you wouldn't need one of my cards.
translation.zh: 如果你天资好的话 也许就不需要我的卡片了

translation.en: You punched me in the throat!
translation.zh: 你在我的脖子上揍了一拳！
调查一宗“同性恋谋杀案”

translation.en: One of your butt buddies was found in the river this morning
translation.zh: 今早有人在河里 发现了你的一个好基友

translation.en: with a bunch of water where his internal organs used to be.
translation.zh: 他之前内脏所在的地方 有一大滩水

translation.en: Shouldn't I be asking you that?
-You think that I--? -He was your competition, right?
translation.zh: 你觉得是我… 他是你的竞争对手

translation.en: You got somebody watching over you.
You get out your feather pen,
and you write a nice little card
that'll open my girlfriend's legs again.
translation.zh: 让我的女友再次春心荡漾

translation.en: I might consider dropping your bloody shirt at the dry cleaners.
translation.zh: 我或许会考虑 把你带血的衬衫丢进干洗机

translation.en: And tossing that blade in the river.
translation.zh: 然后将那把刀丢进河里

translation.en: [newscaster] Police have identified the body as one Orwell G. Taft,
translation.zh: 警方确认尸体是奥威尔G塔夫特

translation.en: Nothing more is known at this time.
He probably had a second family somewhere.
translation.zh: 他也许在某处有第二个家庭

translation.en: Or he was an S&M junkie,
liked to be whipped and kicked around
or held underwater to get his jollies.
translation.zh: 抑或喜欢被淹在水下以获得快感
嘿 有什么大新闻吗？

translation.en: Why is everybody so much more depressed than usual?
translation.zh: 为什么诸位比平常更抑郁？

translation.en: Jeez Louise, Mr. Wentworth, did you get into a car accident?
translation.zh: 老天爷 温特沃斯先生 你出车祸了？

translation.en: It hit me in the face. Somebody's shoe.
translation.zh: 直接砸到我脸上 某人的鞋子

translation.en: They found him floating in the river this morning.
translation.zh: 他们早上发现他漂在河里

translation.en: Another one bites the dust, huh?
-Hey. -Oh. Sorry. Something happened to my face.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我的脸弄伤了

translation.en: Do you want to drink about it?
I think I'd better not tonight.
Um, I... I brought you something.
I hope it comforts your face.
Uh, and my phone number's on the bottom of it.
My sister dragged his ass back to Chicago,
translation.zh: 我妹妹把他拽去芝加哥去了
去骚扰我的另一个兄弟

translation.en: Oh-- uh, I got an idea.
How about a yard sale, then?
You can put price tags on everything here.
translation.zh: 你可以给这里的所有东西贴上标价

translation.en: Uh, this couch. My bed frame.
translation.zh: 这个沙发 我的床架

translation.en: That's a thousand bucks right there.
I got all this small stuff, like the kitchenware
translation.zh: 我有一大堆小东西 比如厨房用具

translation.en: You put all that on one card table right in the middle of the room
translation.zh: 你把那些都放在房间中央的 一张牌桌上

translation.en: and a little sign that says,
I mean, well, name your price.
Well, see, I still-- I get to live here while it goes on.
translation.zh: 听着 这个活动期间 我得住在这里

translation.en: It's kind of like a living showroom.
Did you hear about that writer who, uh--
Well, he didn't swim very good.
translation.zh: 嗯 他的游泳技术不太好

translation.en: Very well. He didn't swim very well.
translation.zh: 好吧 他游得不太精湛

translation.en: You teach English with that mouth?
I think it has something to do with this, uh...
They're killing people over a new holiday?
translation.zh: 他们为一个新节日就把人弄死？

translation.en: Follow the money. It's-- I saw it in a movie once.
translation.zh: 跟着钱走 这个… 我有次在电影中看过

translation.en: Hey, but if you're actually worried, you know, you can move out to the 'burbs.
translation.zh: 嘿 不过如果你真的担心 你可以搬去郊区
我们在这里会慢慢死去

translation.en: Get you a job teaching Driver's Ed. Speed things up.
translation.zh: 你可以当驾校老师 加速死亡

translation.en: [minister] And we have come to the moment in our service
translation.zh: 我们现在面临这样一个时刻

translation.en: where we can go no farther,
and stand on the edge of a chasm,
[minister] Our God, we are grateful that Orwell...
translation.zh: 我们的上帝啊 我们感激你 奥威尔…

translation.en: Guess his novel wasn't working out, so he gave up.
translation.zh: -我猜他的小说没写好 所以放弃了 -胡说

translation.en: [minister] And we know that he is wrapped tight...
translation.zh: 我们知道他被紧紧包裹在…

translation.en: I think he was writing a card for this new holiday.
translation.zh: 我觉得他在为新节日写卡片

translation.en: What are you--? No one's getting killed over this, Ray.
translation.zh: 雷 没人会因此被杀

translation.en: We're talking about a card here.
[minister] ...grateful that he now sings with angels...
translation.zh: …心怀感激 如今他和天使一同吟唱…

translation.en: ...wrapped tight in the arms and the bosom of Abraham...
translation.zh: 紧紧包裹在亚伯拉罕的 臂弯和胸怀中…

translation.en: I don't know, I just work here.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只是在这工作

translation.en: It's professional curiosity. Taft and I worked together.
translation.zh: 这纯属职业上的好奇心 塔夫特曾经是我的同事

translation.en: Your husband was the writer I always measured myself against.
translation.zh: 作为作家 我总是拿自己跟你丈夫比

translation.en: And I always came up short.
won me over with a card.
I'm afraid I wasn't the greatest prize.
translation.zh: 我担心我不是最大的奖项

translation.en: Did you attend the company picnics, huh? Christmas party?
translation.zh: 你参加过公司野餐会吗？ 圣诞聚会？

translation.en: Right. Now, wait, you're in the greetings industry.
translation.zh: 对 我是说 你在贺卡业

translation.en: Romance, purely. I don't have time for that other shit.
translation.zh: 纯浪漫型 我没时间弄那个鬼东西

translation.en: You tell me, was he writing a card for this new holiday?
translation.zh: （亲爱的 我爱你） 你告诉我 他在为新节日写卡片吗？
嗯 是的 他情不自禁

translation.en: -Who was he working for? -Gundy, of course.
translation.zh: 他在替谁工作？ 当然是冈迪了
嗯 我知道他 五A问候公司的老板

translation.en: No, come on. Not Robert Gundy.
translation.zh: 不是 得了 不是罗伯特冈迪

translation.en: Dillon, his brother, the owner of Paper Hearts.
translation.zh: 是他哥迪伦 一纸心事的老板
等等 冈迪有个哥哥？

translation.en: I've just been feeling so lonely,
without Orwell's voice buzzing in the air, you know?
translation.zh: 听不到奥威尔的声音嗡嗡响 你懂吗？

translation.en: -Clomping around. -Listen, can I use your back door?
translation.zh: 听着 我能用一下你的后门吗？

translation.en: Yeah, of your house. Can I use it?
translation.zh: 对 你家的后门 我能用吗？

translation.en: What are you doing with the lady, huh?
translation.zh: 你跟那位女士在做什么？
你对双性恋有好奇心？ 啊？
冈迪付钱给我 还有谁？

translation.en: I don't have to tell you anything. Now, where's the card?
translation.zh: 我什么都不用告诉你 卡片在哪？

translation.en: Get to it, or I might have to find my favorite bloody shirt.
translation.zh: 快去写 不然我得去找我最喜欢的 带血衬衫了

translation.en: Take a picture. It'll last longer.
translation.zh: 拍张照 能持续更久

translation.en: We wouldn't care if you was, mister.
translation.zh: 我们不在乎你是不是 先生
我们之前是种族主义者

translation.en: I'm Betcher. This here's Adolph Haggert.
translation.zh: 我是贝奇 这是阿道夫哈吉特

translation.en: Call him Sonnyboy. He don't like Adolph no more.
translation.zh: 叫他阳光男孩就好 他不再喜欢阿道夫了
我们改过自新了 嗯

translation.en: I spent two years in a maximum security prison
translation.zh: 我在最高安全级别的监狱里待了两年

translation.en: for a hate crime I did not commit.
translation.zh: 因为一项我没犯下的仇恨罪行

translation.en: It was planned as a hate crime.
I couldn't get that fucking cross into the ground.
translation.zh: 我没法把那个该死的十字架放在地上

translation.en: It's a lot tougher than it looks.
hating a whole race of folks, now that's an awful lot of work.
translation.zh: 憎恨整个种族的人 工作量很大

translation.en: So you don't hate anyone now?
translation.zh: 所以你现在谁也不恨了？

translation.en: So, who do you hate now?
You know what them are, fancy man?
translation.zh: 你知道他们怎么样吗 公子哥？

translation.en: Them's people think they're better than other people.
translation.zh: 他们觉得自己比其他人优秀

translation.en: I got news for you: They ain't!
translation.zh: 我告诉你个新闻 他们并不比别人强

translation.en: Nobody's better than nobody, that's our motto these days.
translation.zh: 没人比其他人更优秀 这是我们现在的座右铭

translation.en: And if you think you is, we'll fuck you up till you isn't.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得你是 我们就会把你弄到不是

translation.en: Good to finally meet you, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.zh: 终于见到你了 太开心了 温特沃斯先生

translation.en: My wrist is still a little broken.
My goodness. Your lip-- looks like fresh blood.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 你的嘴唇…像是刚刚弄出血的

translation.en: I hope you don't mind watching me eat. I'm famished.
translation.zh: 我希望你别介意看着我吃东西 我饿坏了
肝脏和甜菜！ 很精致

translation.en: Can I offer you a beer?

translation.zh: 我在服药 所以 好吧

translation.en: A beer for Mr. Wentworth, please.
translation.zh: 请给温特沃斯先生来杯啤酒
这是真的… 第一张卡 是的

translation.en: Napoleon gave it to his mother
after she had a tumor removed from her ankle.
translation.zh: 切除踝关节的肿瘤之后 他送给她的

translation.en: It's French, and it translates into, "Feel better."
translation.zh: 是法语 翻译过来就是“早日康复”

translation.en: She died two days after receiving it.
translation.zh: 收到卡片两天后 她就去世了

translation.en: Sit down, Mr. Wentworth, let's talk.
translation.zh: 请坐 温特沃斯先生 我们谈谈吧

translation.en: No, no, no. No, that belongs to my brother, Dilly.
translation.zh: 不 没有 那是我哥迪伦的

translation.en: Well, Mr. Wentworth, they tell me that you were Card Writer of the Year
translation.zh: 温特沃斯先生 听说你是 2005 2006和2007年的

translation.en: Also that you're divorced, you live alone,
translation.zh: 还有你离婚了 现在独居

translation.en: and you like to watch Bumfights.
What can you see in them, I wonder!
translation.zh: 我想知道 你在他们身上看到了什么！

translation.en: They make me feel better somehow.
He was writing a card for your brother's company.
translation.zh: 他曾为你哥的公司写卡片

translation.en: They found him floating facedown in the river.
translation.zh: 他们发现他脸朝下漂在河里

translation.en: Oh, yes, yes. It was tragic.
Styvesan told me that he was a very skilled writer,
translation.zh: 斯泰韦森跟我说 他是一位技巧纯熟的作家

translation.en: Said there was only one ever better.
translation.zh: 说只有一个人比他更好

translation.en: Yeah, well, his wife is distraught.
translation.zh: 好吧 他的老婆悲痛欲绝

translation.en: Someone ought to send her a card.
translation.zh: 得有人给她送一张卡片

translation.en: That is a hefty accusation, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.zh: 这是一项严重的指控 温特沃斯先生

translation.en: Perhaps you should take that up with the police.
translation.zh: 也许你应该和警察去说

translation.en: The word is, you have a sweetheart, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.zh: 听说你有个心上人 温特沃斯先生

translation.en: Detective Miller. He works for me on the side.
translation.zh: 米勒警探 他兼职给我打工

translation.en: I thought Styvesan worked for you.
translation.zh: 我以为斯泰韦森替你做事

translation.en: That's good, that's very good. I mean, after all,
translation.zh: 真是不错 我是说 总而言之

translation.en: you need to feel the feelings before you can write about them.
translation.zh: 你下笔之前 首先得有感觉

translation.en: So I write the card for her and I give it to you. That doesn't seem fair.
translation.zh: 所以我为她写卡片 然后给你 这样似乎不公平

translation.en: Well, my father used to say, "Fair is where you end up."
translation.zh: 我父亲过去常说 “公平时你就完了”

translation.en: I have a sixth sense about these things, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.zh: 温特沃斯先生 我对这些事有第六感

translation.en: You've been a fool for love before.
You've got the gene for it.

translation.zh: 不 我是个愤世嫉俗的人

translation.en: No, I'm a cynic. You're cynical. There's a difference.
translation.zh: 我是愤世嫉俗的人 你愤世嫉俗 这是有区别的

translation.en: I never believed in the first place, but you,
translation.zh: 我一开始就没相信过 但是你

translation.en: you wake up every morning disappointed to find the world the way it is
translation.zh: 你每天早上醒来看到世界这个样子 都很失望
鲁珀特 带温特沃斯先生出去
地方真不错 讽刺真不错

translation.en: I mean, they're made out of real... plastic.
translation.zh: 我是说 它们使用真正的…塑料做的

translation.en: But, uh, if you have a magic act, they can--
translation.zh: 如果你有魔法 它们能…
我开玩笑的 纯粹开玩笑的

translation.en: I can water them with soda pop.
translation.zh: 我可以用汽水浇灌它们

translation.en: They're beautiful. They-- they smell funny.
translation.zh: 它们很漂亮 闻起来味道很怪

translation.en: Here you go. Look at this.
Oh, that's my, uh, collection of ugly purses.
translation.zh: 那是我收集的丑陋钱包
-它们真的很丑 -嗯 谢谢你

translation.en: Baby shoes. Um... who do those belong to?
translation.zh: 婴儿鞋 这些是谁的？

translation.en: Yeah, those-- those are actually mine.
translation.zh: 这些是谁的？ 这些其实都是我的

translation.en: Last couple of years, I've been...
translation.zh: 过去几年来 我一直…

translation.en: looking for those feelings, and, uh...
Why don't you write me a card and tell me all about it?
translation.zh: 不如你给我写张卡片 然后跟我说说？

translation.en: Sorry for calling you so early.
You kidding me? I've been up since 5:30 a.m.
translation.zh: 我早上五点半就起床了

translation.en: How many fish did you catch?
Ray! Tell me you got something for me!
translation.zh: 雷！告诉我你有东西给我！

translation.en: I did it. It's the best I ever wrote. It-- it's pithy and it's sweet.
translation.zh: 我写好了 这是我最好的作品 简洁甜蜜

translation.en: It's got heart, and after this, I'm done, okay?
translation.zh: 倾注了真心 这之后我就不干了 好吗？
我会确保你得到很好的报酬

translation.en: Yeah. The real one's right here. You can't have it.
translation.zh: 没错 真正的在这里 不能给你

translation.en: You can't have it! I didn't write it for you.
translation.zh: 不能给你！我不是为你而写的

translation.en: I'm gonna give it to the person I wrote it for,
translation.zh: 我要拿给我的写作对象

translation.en: and you can suck my dick, okay?
translation.zh: 你可以舔我的老二 好吗？

translation.en: Hey. You up for some spaghetti and booze?
translation.zh: 嘿 要来点意面和酒吗？

translation.en: I know this is impromptu, but this is...
translation.zh: -雷 -我知道这有点即兴 不过这是…
“真正香槟味的酒精饮料” 这…

translation.en: -Ray, I-I don't think-- -Don't worry. It's done.
translation.zh: -雷 我不想… -别担心 完成了

translation.en: I'm not giving it to anyone. Just you.
translation.zh: 我不会给任何人 只给你

translation.en: Because I wrote it for you.
I'd love a gander at that, if you're done.
translation.zh: 如果你写完的话 我想看看

translation.en: So, it was a chick that did the trick, huh?
Well, Gundy figured one of us would get it.
translation.zh: 冈迪觉得 我们中总有一个人能办成

translation.en: Nice job, huh? Well, beauty wins. Whatever.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 美人获胜 管他的

translation.en: All right, let's see what gay sentence turned on the lady's faucets.
translation.zh: 好 来看看什么样的基佬句子 赢得了这位女士的芳心

translation.en: -Where's the damn card? -You got it, fancy pants?
translation.zh: 那张该死的卡片在哪？ 在你手上吗 娘娘腔？
卡片在哪？ 卡片在哪？

translation.en: He's still got it in his mind.
Hey, what are we waiting for?

translation.zh: 动动脑子 阳光男孩

translation.en: You know, I got a card when I got out of prison one time,
translation.zh: 你知道 有一次我出狱时
收到我妈妈的一张卡片

translation.en: with brains, muscles, looks, and girls chasing you...
translation.zh: 拥有头脑 体魄 相貌 以及追求你的姑娘…
那该死的东西割到我了！

translation.en: Styvesan told the boss that you did have it.
translation.zh: 斯泰韦森跟老板说你有

translation.en: He said that you said that it was your best card ever.
translation.zh: 他说你说过 那是你有史以来最好的作品

translation.en: Ask the woman. She saw it.
translation.zh: 问这个女人 她看到了

translation.en: Then you're gonna have to say what was on it.
translation.zh: 你必须说出上面的内容

translation.en: Hey, what's the worst place you can get a papercut?
translation.zh: 被纸割伤的最可怕的位置是哪？

translation.en: Ooh, how about the pee hole?
-That's it, the eye. -Yeah, right on the eyeball.
Tell 'em what the card said. Just tell them. Why does it even matter?
translation.zh: 把卡片上的内容告诉他们 有什么关系呢？

translation.en: 'Cause. You got paid to be with me.
translation.zh: 因为 因为你收了钱和我在一起

translation.en: You know what that makes you? A whore.
translation.zh: 你知道这样做 让你变成什么了吗？荡妇
每个人在这里都是平等的

translation.en: Oh, language! There's a child present.
translation.zh: 注意措辞 有小孩子在场

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm afraid it's Take Your Daughter To Work Day,
translation.zh: 抱歉 恐怕今天是“带女儿上班日”

translation.en: and I guess I take even the most off-brand holiday seriously.
translation.zh: 我猜 即便对普普通通的节日 我都认真对待

translation.en: Ellie, that's enough. You'll see Auntie Jill soon enough. You okay?
translation.zh: -艾莉 够了 很快就能见到吉尔阿姨 -你没事吧？

translation.en: Adolph, would you kindly escort my daughter outside and sit with her?
translation.zh: 阿道夫 能请你护送我女儿出去 陪她坐着吗？

translation.en: Well, stop looking at me like I'm a donut and keep my daughter company!
translation.zh: 别把我当成甜甜圈一样看着 去陪我的女儿！

translation.en: Look at the clouds. There's some fascinating shapes today.
translation.zh: 看看这云 今天的形状很漂亮
好了 孩子们都走了

translation.en: Now, let's us adults have some straight talk.
translation.zh: 我们成年人就开门见山吧
卡片在哪 温特沃斯先生？

translation.en: Taft was writing a card for my competition.
translation.zh: 塔夫特给我的竞争对手写卡片

translation.en: I learned long ago, never let the trappings of shared DNA
translation.zh: 我很早之前就懂得 千万不要让亲人

translation.en: -All this for a fucking card? -Shut up!
translation.zh: -这一切只是为了一张该死的卡片？ -闭嘴！

translation.en: Is your brother as crazy as you are?
My brother had everything handed to him.
translation.zh: 我哥不费吹灰之力就得到一切

translation.en: The blind luck of the firstborn. But not me, Mr. Wentworth.
translation.zh: 长子就是撞大运 我却不一样 温特沃斯先生

translation.en: I had to fight and claw my way for everything.
translation.zh: 我的一切都是艰苦奋斗得来的
不 你什么都得不到

translation.en: Come on, Raymond, he was your competition.
translation.zh: 得了 雷蒙德 他是你的竞争对手

translation.en: Why did you have to kill him?
translation.zh: 你为什么一定要杀了他？

translation.en: what do you know about holidays?
translation.zh: 关于节日 你知道些什么？

translation.en: Fourth of July? Nothing less than a war.
translation.zh: 美国独立日？ 不过是一场战争而已

translation.en: A woman goes through nine months of excruciating pregnancy,
translation.zh: 一个女人承受九个月的 痛苦孕期

translation.en: and tops it off with a small human awash in her own blood.
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是 在她的鲜血中会诞生个小人儿

translation.en: And what did it take to have Christmas and Easter?
translation.zh: 圣诞节和复活节怎么来的？

translation.en: Biggest holidays of them all, the top two.
translation.zh: 所有节日中最大的两个

translation.en: It took the greatest man who ever lived
Do you understand, Mr. Wentworth? It's all about sacrifice.
translation.zh: 你明白吗 温特沃斯先生？ 节日就是牺牲

translation.en: The universe cries out for sacrifice,
and I'm simply following the template.
translation.zh: 我不过是遵循模板而已

translation.en: when my junky nephew and Jill bore a child,
translation.zh: 我吸毒的侄子和吉尔生了个小孩后

translation.en: I simply wanted to have the little bean brought up properly.
translation.zh: 我只希望这个小家伙能被好好养大

translation.en: Of course, I was foolish enough to let her stay in the child's life.
translation.zh: 当然 我曾蠢到 让她继续待在这个孩子的生命中

translation.en: It was a tangled web indeed,
but now I intend to clear the situation up,
translation.zh: 不过我现在打算把情况处理好

translation.en: You get the card, Jill gets the girl.
translation.zh: 卡给你 女孩给吉尔

translation.en: That child is going to grow up knowing herself
translation.zh: 在成长过程过中 那孩子会知道

translation.en: in a higher class than she was born to.
translation.zh: 她身处的阶层 要高于自己出生时所在的阶层

translation.en: I intend for her to have the best and be the best,
translation.zh: 我希望她得到最好的一切 成为最优秀的人

translation.en: and she will never hear a whisper
of her no-account, drug addict birth father
translation.zh: 关于她那没用的瘾君子生父

translation.en: or her whore of a mother.
translation.zh: 或她当婊子的母亲的消息

translation.en: [Ray] After all that, I gave them the damn card.
translation.zh: 一切过后 我把该死的卡给了他们

translation.en: They found a nice, cheery front to sell it, and that did the trick.
translation.zh: 他们找到一个漂亮愉快的人 来进行销售 这招很管用

translation.en: Made people feel good, I guess,
translation.zh: （“女友日”竞赛冠军） 大概让人们感觉很良好吧

translation.en: the kind of good feeling some dumb card can give you.
translation.zh: 这种良好感觉 一张好卡片也能给你

translation.en: I don't sell my feelings anymore, either.
translation.zh: 我不再出卖自己的感情了

translation.en: I'm saving 'em up for somebody special.
translation.zh: 我把它们保留起来 留给特别的人

translation.en: -What, did I do something wrong? -No, no, no. Pull up a little bit.
translation.zh: 什么？我做错什么了吗？ 靠边停车
